places.title: Praia da Graciosa
places.address: Av. Theotônio Segurado, s/n - Plano Diretor Sul, Palmas - TO
places.short_description: An artificial beach on Lago de Palmas, perfect for swimming, stand-up paddleboarding, and relaxing. It has food kiosks and live music on weekends.

places.title: Parque Cesamar
places.address: 103 Sul, Av. NS 01, s/n - Plano Diretor Sul, Palmas - TO
places.short_description: A large urban park with walking trails, a lake, sports courts, and playgrounds. Great for jogging, picnics, and birdwatching.

places.title: Serra do Lajeado
places.address: TO-020 Highway, near Palmas (30 min drive)
places.short_description: A mountain range with hiking trails leading to breathtaking views of Palmas and the Tocantins River. Best visited early morning or sunset.

places.title: Boat Tour on Lago de Palmas
places.short_description: Sunset boat rides, fishing trips, and kayak rentals available on the lake. Some tours include drinks and snacks.

places.title: Espaço Cultural José Gomes Sobrinho
places.address: 106 Sul, Av. LO 06, s/n - Plano Diretor Sul, Palmas - TO
places.short_description: A cultural hub with art exhibitions, theater, and live music. Check their schedule for events.

places.title: Feira da 304 Sul
places.address: Av. LO 06, 304 Sul - Plano Diretor Sul, Palmas - TO
places.short_description: A vibrant market with local food stalls selling pamonha, pequi rice, pastel, and crafts. Open on weekends.

places.title: Palmas Cathedral
places.address: Av. Teotônio Segurado, s/n - Plano Diretor Sul, Palmas - TO
places.short_description: A modern church with stunning stained glass and a peaceful atmosphere.

places.title: Mirante da Serra do Carmo
places.alt: Viewpoint of the Serra do Carmo
places.address: Serra do Carmo, near Taquaruçu (25 km from Palmas)
places.short_description: A panoramic viewpoint offering the best sunset views over Palmas. Great for photos!

places.title: Nightlife at Avenida JK
places.address: Av. JK, Plano Diretor Sul, Palmas - TO
places.short_description: The main nightlife strip with bars, clubs, and live music. Try Boteco do Jaú or Bar do Zé.

places.title: Taquaruçu
places.short_description: A charming eco-village with waterfalls (like Cachoeira da Roncadeira), hiking, and rustic restaurants.
